original_text: Each of you men must learn to rule his own body properly. Then you will do only what is pure and right.
korean_text: 각각 거룩함과 존귀함으로 자기의 아내 대할 줄을 알고

sentences.original_text: Each of you men must learn
to rule his own body properly
Then you will do only what is pure
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 오직 순수한 것만 행할 것이다
